data.title: How to identify a sales order which A/R invioce has been generated ?

qas.question: How to identify a sales order which A/R invioce has been generated ? Becouse there is a option to close sales order any time if Document status is open.

answers.text: Sandeep, the link is through lines of A/R invoice. In lines of invoice (table INV1) are fields BaseRef BaseType BaseEntry BaseLine and this fields identify from which document and which lines of the document the invoice was created with copy from/to functionality. BaseType = 17 is salesw order BaseEntry is docentry of sales order BaseRef is docnum of source document Base Line is line in rows of sales order - table rdr1 hope this answers your question

data.title: Which tables are use for Balance Sheet Report ,Profit and Losse Statement.

qas.question: Dear all Which tables are use to create Balance Sheet Report ,Profit and Losse Statement Report and Trial Balance Report ? Thanks and Regurd Subhas

answers.text: The reports are calculated results from Journal Entry tables (OJDT & JDT1). However, it would be very difficult to recreate the same result with user query. Thanks, Gordon

data.title: service tax calculate on which expenses

qas.question: Dear friends, Service tax calculate on Which type of expenses? what is the use of calculate Service tax? Regards, Mallika

answers.text: Hi, If you availing the services from any vendor, He may charge Service tax inorder to pay it again to Gov. as per Tax rules. Again Service charges vary depend on type of services. So, In PO it self we have to mention in line item at Taxes like Excise taxes. Generally it calculated on overall values(include Basic+Excise) Regards R

data.title: Which BAPI can I used to update Planned Delivery in Material Master

However, I am unable to figure out how they should be used. I have tried both in SE37 unsuccessfully. I think that BAPI_MATERIAL_SAVEREPLICA shows the most promise, but can't figure it out. data.title: Rounding off Amount which has 3 decimal places

qas.question: Dear All ! ! Urgent Help required i need to round the Amount of 3 decimal pleaces for example 300.777 should be round to 300.800 300.340 should be round to 300.300 or 300.977 should be rounded to 301.000 Payroll in international for Bahrain and Oman both currency value is too high but they use to round after decimal. Can any one Guide any function any operation or some other solution will be highly regarded Thanks Syed Baddar

answers.text: Hi You can do this by writing a rounding calculation rule. Or ask an ABAPer to write a simple routine in payroll driver program RPCALCX0. It has an exit where he/she can write a small routine for this. Regards Waz

data.title: How to Return Material which procured under Account Assignment category ?

qas.question: Hi, Could any one please tell me How to Return Material which procured under Account Assignment category ? 1. I created P.O. 2. Recerived Goods against this P.O with account category K 3. Made Invoice verification through MIRO and settled the amount. 4. Now want to return the material and subsequently want to create Credit Memo. For Stock items I am able to return the material. But non-stock item which bought for cost center could not return through Googs return MIGO. I am getting error " Deficit of PU IR quantity 10.00EA" Kind Regards, Sankar.K

answers.text: Hi , Since the material is a cost center based , so no stock is maintained . And since you don't have any stock , hence this error is coming . 1 way around is simply raise a credit memo . Thanks Dipak

data.title: Pricing for components which are appearing multiple times in BOM

qas.question: Currently in Public cloud in AVC scenario if a BOM contains similar components multiple times (For example, Position 0010 Qty = 2 & 0040 Qty = 2) and in sales order the quantity of FERT is 1, meaning the component total qty = 4. For this component variant price is maintained in the configuration profile. But in sales order pricing only the first appearance on this component is considered. (For example Unit price = 100 in Sales order pricing total price = 200). Ideally SAP System should consider the total quantity, so total price should be 400. Do you know if there is a workaround so that system considers the total quantity of the component for pricing? Thank you!

answers.text: No accepted solution found

data.title: Which released CDS view can be used to retrieve cost / budget related data shown in  app "project cost report", "project budget report" etc ?

qas.question: I posted this question /answer for our customer's reference.

answers.text: For EPPM reports (project cost report, project budget report etc), we are fetching the values from the Financial CDS view "I_ActualPlanJournalEntryItem" which is released. From EPPM side, we do not have any released CDS views. The customer can try to utilize the mentioned Financial CDS view to fulfill specific requirements.

data.title: List of sale Orders for which MRP RUN on particular date

qas.question: Hi experts we are running MRP In background thru MDBT Transaction,Our client wants to know List of sale Orders for which MRP Was run on a Particular date, are there any Standard Reports or Tables from which we get the Details.

answers.text: Hi, Your question is not really clear, or your client's requirement is not well defined; MRP is planning a material in a plant. If you work MTO, then also in a customer segment. The result may be nothing (but still planning took place, just the coverage is enough), or one or more planned supply elements, and eventually exception messages. In some cases (planning strategies), customer orders don't create requirements at all! So, to your question, planning results can be seen in the MRP list (MD05, MD06). Regards, Mario

data.title: In which report can i get the Work center wise start and finish in hours.

qas.question: Hi, I Need a small suggestion. Now i open CR03 Here i can able to see the work centers list. Under capacity tab and at capacity header i can see the Start time and Finish time.May i know at Which report i can able to get these fields . I can able to get it from table level KAKO , But data is in Seconds wise , actually i need hourly wise. And one more thing is Operation time and Capacity fields i am not able to get it from the KAKO Table. Through the forum i was checked CR05 Report but there is no fields like Start and Finish Time. Can any body tell me In which report can i get the details.

answers.text: Hello, Check CM01 under Detailed capacity list, here you have an option to choose fields as per your requirement. Available Capacity table KAKO take the fields BEGZT(shift start), ENDZT(shift end) and PAUSE(break time),divide this value by 3600 and you will get it hours. Best Regards, R.Brahmankar

data.title: Display of production orders which are only released in co11n screen

qas.question: HI, In co11n screen when i press the f4 button and i select the search production order by mrp controller by entering the mrp controller say 150 then i should only the production orders which has to be confirmed i should not get the list of production orders which are already confirmed, delivered,teco,and created but not released how i get that in co11n screen Regards Badri

answers.text: Hi Badri, In CO11N in production order confirmation screen, on order field when you click F4 or serach, choose te option "" In production order using the info system , here you put MRP controller , plant, order type, and in status field restrict as per your requirement, select CNF and click on exclude After searching through this , you get orders which are not confirmed. This will solve you issue. Hope you and try and confirm. Best regards, Sharat

data.title: Delete HCM Process (HRASR_DT) from database which is in completed status.

qas.question: Dear All, Dear All, I am in a great need of your urgent help as today is our Go-live for SAP HCM. In order to check if all is set in production system, I have run 2 HCM processes for testing and they are in completed status now. Now those processes are coming in Process Browser report, I want to delete them from database since they were just for final testing. rocess Browser report How can i do delete them? Kindly reply as early as possible. How can i do delete them? Kindly reply as early as possible. Chohan.

answers.text: HelloChohan, Chohan Not sure if it is too late for you. You can set the production client as not productive and then use transaction HRASRPROCESS_UTILITY. Once done you can set the client back as production client. Hope this helps. Regards, Sahir.

Could anybody help on this pls ? Thanks in advance.

answers.text: Hi, I believe Storage type level comes first, then movement type level. Rgds, Kris.

data.title: Migration of Items for which IR done and GR not done

qas.question: Hi, We are migrating from legacy to SAP. On FI we are migration following items - Migration of Trial Balance as of a cut off date - Migration of AR,AP and GL Open Items We will have some IRs for which GRs are not done, what should be strategy for migrating the same. Kindly note that we are not migrating POs from legacy. Thanks Balla

answers.text: If you don't migrate the PO from legacy to SAP then you will not be able to do the 3-way match automatically on SAP. I suggest you convert IR over as open item in AP but populate the payment block to prevent them from being paid by the payment run. Whenever GR is done in legacy system or manually by paper tracking or otherwise the user should release the payment block on the AP invoice. If SAP is the inventory system I would assume the user also need to perform the GR as a 501 movement type (goods receipt without order). The account used when doing the 501 movement type should be the provision account used in legacy system (provision account for 'invoiced, not yet received').

answers.text: Hello, IMG path: MM -> valuation and account assignment->account determination->account determination without wizard->define valuation classes. Best Regards, Gladys xing

data.title: Sap Gurus, Can you please explain what is retro in pc00_payresult?how to see which month is going retro.?kindly explain in detail.

qas.question: Sap Gurus, Can you please explain what is retro in pc00_payresult?how to see which month is going retro.?kindly explain in detail.

answers.text: HiNandagopi N HiNandagopi N Hi Nandagopi N Nandagopi N Nandagopi N Please Check Payroll Results using PC_PAYRESULT Please Check Payroll Results using PC_PAYRESULT When executing a payroll run, you need to check your payroll results to ensure that employees are paid correctly. It should be done any time after you have executed a Start Payroll, and definitely before you execute a bank transfer in your SAP system.You can use the transactionPC_PAYRESULT,which displays all payroll related tables in SAP. When executing a payroll run, you need to check your payroll results to ensure that employees are paid correctly. It should be done any time after you have executed a Start Payroll, and definitely before you execute a bank transfer in your SAP system. You can use the transactionPC_PAYRESULT,which displays all payroll related tables in SAP. You can use the transactionPC_PAYRESULT,which displays all payroll related tables in SAP. You can use the transaction PC_PAYRESULT, which displays all payroll related tables in SAP. Salient Features ofPC_PAYRESULT:- Salient Features ofPC_PAYRESULT:- PC_PAYRESULT It includescustomer wage typesandtechnical wage types. customer wage types technical wage types Once you executed a "Start Payroll", payroll results are created for the selected employees. No payroll results are created during a simulation. You can only display payroll results for one particular employee at a time. TypePC_PAYRESULTinto the SAP transaction command box. Type PC_PAYRESULT into the SAP transaction command box. UnderSelection, Under Selection , Enter thePersonnel numberof the employee/s you wish to view pay results. Personnel number Enter thedateyou wish to viewall results from date all results from Hit Enter Key Hit Enter Key In thePersonnel Numbers Selectedsection In the Personnel Numbers Selected section n theOverview of Payroll Resultssection, you can now see all payroll runs that have been executed for this employee, including any payroll run caused by retroactiveaccountingand off-cycle payroll processing.Double click on thePayroll resultsline Item for which you want to view the tables n the Overview of Payroll Results section, you can now see all payroll runs that have been executed for this employee, including any payroll run caused by retroactive accountingand off-cycle payroll processing. accounting accounting and off-cycle payroll processing. Double click on thePayroll resultsline Item for which you want to view the tables Double click on thePayroll resultsline Item for which you want to view the tables Double click on the Payroll results line Item for which you want to view the tables Current Indicator shows: Status of record: This indicator tells you how old a payroll result is. It can have one of three specifications. Specification 'A'-Used for a payroll result generated by the last payroll run, that is, the result is current. Specification 'A'-Used for a payroll result generated by the last payroll run, that is, the result is current. A Specification 'P'-Used when a payroll result has been replaced by a new record during a retroactive accounting run. It then becomes the predecessor of the current record. Specification 'P'-Used when a payroll result has been replaced by a new record during a retroactive accounting run. It then becomes the predecessor of the current record. P Specification 'O':-A payroll result is marked 'O' when it has been replaced by at least two retroactive accounting runs, that is the record is no longer current, nor is it the predecessor of the current record. Specification 'O':-A payroll result is marked 'O' when it has been replaced by at least two retroactive accounting runs, that is the record is no longer current, nor is it the predecessor of the current record. O Double click on the payroll program table you want to view (i.e., RT, RT_, CRT, BT, etc.). Double click on the payroll program table you want to view (i.e., RT, RT_, CRT, BT, etc.). Double click on the payroll program table you want to view (i.e., RT, RT_, CRT, BT, etc.). The selected payroll program table for that particular payroll run will now be displayed. The selected payroll program table for that particular payroll run will now be displayed. Thanks Omprasad Reddy

data.title: Which Results Analysis Method is good for LOSS Projects?

data.title: Scrap Sales GL , which type of cost centers need to assign in OKB9

qas.question: Dear Seniors, G L account : Scrap Sales: For this GL a/c , cost element created with Cost element category u201C11u201D (Revenues). Now in OKB9 i want to make assignments: With each b.area and cost centers. Now my doubt is : In OKB9 which type of cost center I need to assign from the below. 1.Cost center should be with Cost cntr category u201CFu201D (Production) Or 2.Cost center category u201DVu201D (Sales) and another doubts is , in Cost center -control tab: Actual revenues check box, should i select or not in any case. Please clarify my doubt. Thanks in Adv

answers.text: Hi, As scrap sales are revenue to the company, undernoted things to be noted here : 1. The cost element category is V - Sales and the control indicator actual revenues box to be unticked. The posting will be statistical for revenue elements. 2. The revenue recognition has to be equally done in VKOA for the account assignment of this account. 3. You can create a seperate order type for scrap sales and a sales pricing procedure in SD. 4. Check whether the scraps are defined to capture Tax Collected at Source, if so, you have to define condition types for them too. 5. If the material itself is defined as scrap material then in Material master the Profit Center would have been assigned and to capture the revenue assign the scrap sales revenue in VKOA. Best Regards, Sadashivan

data.title: Which is the order the system selects for the minimum movement and sort of the picking list?

qas.question: Hi, we wonder what is the order of storage locations the system proposes when using "minimum Movement" with the material flow rules and sorting the picking list. In the list you find an example of our numbering structure. Which are the relevant fields? Is it assumed that the order is "rack-column-row" or what is asssumed for ordering? warehouse-structure.txt warehouse-structure.txt BR, Klaus

answers.text: Dear Klaus, In the case of Source Strategy "Minimum Movements, System aims to propose Logistics Area (bin) with the largest stock quantities basically sorting from large to small quantities. As the name "Minimum Movements" itself is self explanatory, this minimizes movement that need to be carried out by a worker to pick the required stock. I hope this helps. Regards, Sandeep

data.title: Cancel costs which block settlement within SD-order

qas.question: Hello, I have an issue which is derived from an interface error. Users cannot manually produce it. Example: G/L account 4711 1.000 USD posted in June on cost centre. G/L account 4711 -1.000 USD posted in July on cost centre. Result: It is balanced out (zero). When looking at the field status group of the account only the cost centre is open. The SD-order is not open and not visible during manual posting. The account is thus not assigned to any line-ID in CO-PA which is o.K. However, the Interface made a mistake and posted also - in the Background - to an SD-order item. This can be seen in table BSEG for the FI documents in question. Effect: The account 4711 blocks KKA3 (the results Analysis) because it is not assigned to any line ID. ...and we do not want to assign it. Does anyone know about a trick on how to do KKA3 (and the settlement thereafter) nevertheless? Thanks a lot for any Input. Thomas

answers.text: Hi, I doubt that your cost centre figures are correct, the value type is wrong. The posting to cost centre is statistical in case a sales order position is another CO account assignment (this is the real one). So any cost center report reporting "actual" figures either does not report the statistical posting in june/july or mixes different value types (real/statistical) => no comment. The only "trick" that comes in my mind is a temporary line ID assigment in the debug mode but I definitely do not suggest to make it that way. A temporary customizing change for this particular case is the more accurate way, not to forget the correction of the interface. BR Christian

data.title: Split Valuation of Materials for which Purchase Order exists.

qas.question: Hi, I want to do the split valuation of materials for which Purchase Order already exists and GR has taken Place. Is there any way to do it? Regards, B P Singh

answers.text: Hi, Not Possible to activate the split valuation for the po exist material and stock material. Because valuation class are stored in that material. so u have to cancel the grn and cancel the po first then only system allow u to activate the split valuation for this material. Venkatesh
